name: The Reaper's Dead Smile
description:
In a haunted house stood on shivering sticks in a grove of Gregory, Germany, there lived a deaf, orphaned, and widowed man...

What was buried will not eternal lie.

A short, ten minute, horror/mystery visual novel where you try to save your soul from being sent to Hell by guessing your killer. Inspired by Grimm's Fairy Tales. Created for the O2A2 Visual Novel Game Jam.
